#*** one hot Encoding

install.packages("lattice")
library(caret)
ohe_features<-c("cut","color","clarity")
dummies<-dummyVars(~cut + color + clarity ,data=diamonds)

data02_ohe<-as.data.frame(predict(dummies,newdata=diamonds))
data03_combined<-cbind(diamonds,data02_ohe)

data04<-data03_combined[,!names(data03_combined)%in%ohe_features]

rm(data03_combined)
rm(data02_ohe)
